Package view.menu.scenes

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MenuScene.MenuObserver
    This interface indicates the operations that an observer of the MenuScene can do.
    SettingsScene.SettingsObserver
    This interface indicates the operations that an observer of a SettingsScene can do.
    WelcomeScene.WelcomeObserver
    This interface indicates the operations that an observer of a WelcomeScene can do.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    InformationScene
    This class handles the information scene of the menu.
    MenuScene
    This class manages the main menu of the game.
    ScoresScene
    This class handles the view dedicated to the display of the user's scores.
    SettingsScene
    This class handles the settings menu of the game.
    WelcomeScene
    This class handles the view displayed the first time that the application is started and there isn't a score file.
